title: Add config-based switching to fillDorCondos for ArcGIS support
description:
Add config-based switching to fillDorCondos in DorStore.js to support both Carto and ArcGIS.

## Context
- Current implementation queries Carto: https://phl.carto.com/api/v2/sql?q=select * from condominium
- ArcGIS endpoint: https://services.arcgis.com/fLeGjb7u4uXqeF9q/ArcGIS/rest/services/Condominium/FeatureServer/0
- Field names are identical in both APIs (mapref, status, recmap, condoparcel, condounit)
- Follow the established pattern from LiStore.js

## Implementation
1. Add dorCondos key to src/config/apiSources.js
2. Import API_SOURCES in DorStore.js
3. Rename fillDorCondos to _fillDorCondosCarto
4. Create _fillDorCondosArcGIS querying FeatureServer with where=mapref='...' AND status IN (1,3)
5. New fillDorCondos dispatches based on config

## Testing
- Write test similar to LiStore.test.js to verify ArcGIS endpoint returns expected data
close_reason: Implemented config-based switching for fillDorCondos. Tests pass, build succeeds.
